dialogue.name: Qyvnily Glorying
lines: The trials are crucial for my eduction; what I learn about humans from you will impact how I interface with Molly during Incarnation.
Mother and I also wish to know you specifically. You may have a place on the board, so to speak, hopefully at our side.
She designed this trial to force you into atavistic decision making, stripped of complexity. Her methods are more heavy-handed than I would prefer, but she knows best.

dialogue.name: Qyvnily's Glorious Clues
lines: Look to the magic of this demiplane for power, and seek out a Forbidding, a place that even the terrifying would fear.
Wreathe yourself in artifacts and you will find glory:
Slippers to pad like a tigress in the night wear a ring of hedges 'neath towering observatory /
Worship my mother and follow where her right hand points to the end of the world to find a Diadem; it will flare fire to melt all the hells /
Verdancy spirals in upon a Violet Vial to wear nestled upon your bountiful chest; its power will spread the chaos of your storms far and wide /
An Iron Sword yearns for the sky, locked away at a nexus of stone in sight of a stone garden but far from the Violet Vial's spiral.
thoughts: Did any of that makes sense? I really should have written something down instead of coming up with it on the spot.
